channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- The installer of Visual Studio Community
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- The installer of Visual Studio Community

item.title: CVE-2018-0596|2024-08-05T03:28:11.126Z -- microsoft -- the%20installer%20of%20visual%20studio%20community
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Visual Studio Community allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
